product.title: InfinitiPRO by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ionic One Step Style and Dry Hair Dryer SD9NX
product.description: The Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler features three attachments that lock securely into place and give this 3-in-1 Styler a hold on your hairstyling needs. Featuring Ionic Technology this styler fights frizz and brings out natural shine. The gentle heat from Tourmaline Ceramic Technology evenly dries for smooth, silky hair with less heat damage! Includes three attachments to achieve a variety of looks and styles. Attachments include 1. Dual Row Straightening Brush 2. Bristle Styling Brush and 3. Detangling Comb. BONUS One 'n Only Argan Oil treatment that protects, revitalizes, and nourishes hair. Refer to instruction manual before use.
product.description_html: The Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler features three attachments that lock securely into place and give this 3-in-1 Styler a hold on your hairstyling needs. Featuring Ionic Technology this styler fights frizz and brings out natural shine. The gentle heat from Tourmaline Ceramic Technology evenly dries for smooth, silky hair with less heat damage! Includes three attachments to achieve a variety of looks and styles. Attachments include 1. Dual Row Straightening Brush 2. Bristle Styling Brush and 3. Detangling Comb. BONUS One 'n Only Argan Oil treatment that protects, revitalizes, and nourishes hair. Refer to instruction manual before use.
product.description_full:
The Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler features three attachments that lock securely into place and give this 3-in-1 Styler a hold on your hairstyling needs. Featuring Ionic Technology this styler fights frizz and brings out natural shine. The gentle heat from Tourmaline Ceramic Technology evenly dries for smooth, silky hair with less heat damage! Includes three attachments to achieve a variety of looks and styles. Attachments include 1. Dual Row Straightening Brush 2. Bristle Styling Brush and 3. Detangling Comb. BONUS One 'n Only Argan Oil treatment that protects, revitalizes, and nourishes hair. Refer to instruction manual before use. * One Step Style And Dry: This 3 in 1 Styling System features three attachments to achieve the perfect look; It features 3 heat settings and 2-speed settings and a cool shot button to lock styles into place
 * Versatile Use: Includes three attachments for a variety of looks and styles: Bristle Styling Brush, Dual Row Straightening Comb, and Wide Tooth Detangling Comb; Lock Button keeps attachments in place while styling
 * Innovative Design: This styler features Ionic and tourmaline ceramic technology that helps protect hair from heat while adding shine and decreasing frizz by up to 75 percent; Hinged filter for easy maintenance
 * Leader in Hair Dryers: From traditional bonnets to hi-tech dryers equipped with cutting edge technology, Conair has a great selection of hair dryers for every hair type and every hair style
 * Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more; Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories

About Conair Haircare


When it comes to keeping your look on-trend, Conair has you covered. We’ve been doing beautiful things for hair for over 60 years, and we continue to bring you the latest trends and technology. Our full range of professional-quality hair dryers, flat irons, curling irons, curling wands, hair setters, and specialty stylers make it easy to create the looks you love. Bring out the full beauty of your hair with Conair!
product.description_full_html:
The Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ceramic Styler features three attachments that lock securely into place and give this 3-in-1 Styler a hold on your hairstyling needs. Featuring Ionic Technology this styler fights frizz and brings out natural shine. The gentle heat from Tourmaline Ceramic Technology evenly dries for smooth, silky hair with less heat damage! Includes three attachments to achieve a variety of looks and styles. Attachments include 1. Dual Row Straightening Brush 2. Bristle Styling Brush and 3. Detangling Comb. BONUS One 'n Only Argan Oil treatment that protects, revitalizes, and nourishes hair. Refer to instruction manual before use.
  • One Step Style And Dry: This 3 in 1 Styling System features three attachments to achieve the perfect look; It features 3 heat settings and 2-speed settings and a cool shot button to lock styles into place
  • Versatile Use: Includes three attachments for a variety of looks and styles: Bristle Styling Brush, Dual Row Straightening Comb, and Wide Tooth Detangling Comb; Lock Button keeps attachments in place while styling
  • Innovative Design: This styler features Ionic and tourmaline ceramic technology that helps protect hair from heat while adding shine and decreasing frizz by up to 75 percent; Hinged filter for easy maintenance
  • Leader in Hair Dryers: From traditional bonnets to hi-tech dryers equipped with cutting edge technology, Conair has a great selection of hair dryers for every hair type and every hair style
  • Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more; Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories

About Conair Haircare
 

When it comes to keeping your look on-trend, Conair has you covered. We’ve been doing beautiful things for hair for over 60 years, and we continue to bring you the latest trends and technology. Our full range of professional-quality hair dryers, flat irons, curling irons, curling wands, hair setters, and specialty stylers make it easy to create the looks you love. Bring out the full beauty of your hair with Conair!

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
